item.description:
Make it a day or overnight trip to Nantucket!

We did this same trip two years ago and it was a blast!

We'll be staying at the Youth Hostel which is beautifully situated right on the ocean!

I have an overnight reservation currently for 5 men and 5 women so RSVP on this site and then you must call the hostel and ask for the "Fox" reservation, first come first serve! I've reserved 10 spots under my credit card but when you reserve, you must reserve under your credit card and they will deduct from my credit card your confirmation.

We'll likely bike about 20 miles per day, eat, have ice cream, bike some more, eat again :-), and swim at the beach etc... stuff like that :-)

We could rent a group taxi into town for night life.....whatever the group feels like doing.

The Youth Hostel is $35 per night. Parking is at 49 Yarmouth Rd and is $15 per day. There is a shuttle from the parking lot to the dock at 141 School St.

We'll take the Steamship Authority from Hyannis on the 9:15 am departure. Cost for the ferry is $33 round trip plus $12 for bikes.

There is also a $5 fee that goes toward maintaining this group's website.

More details to follow!!

See ya soon!

Rob Fox, Organizer

Please indicate in your RSVP if you'll be doing the day or overnight option. Thank you
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride 617-894-8454
item.name: Nantucket Day or Overnight Trip Option
